languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, прошу прощения, но Идира настаивает на срочной аудиенции с вами. Она крайне возбуждена и уже направилась к вам в покои, бормоча что-то о "решении всех ее проблем". Мне не удалось уговорить ее дождаться более удобного момента, так что она будет у вас с минуты на минуту".

"My apologies, Lord Captain, but Idira insists on being granted an audience. She seemed quite anxious and headed straight to your chambers. I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, прошу прощения, но Идира настаивает на срочной аудиенции с вами. Она крайне возбуждена и уже направилась к вам в покои, бормоча что-то о "решении всех ее проблем". Мне не удалось уговорить ее дождаться более удобного момента, так что она будет у вас с минуты на минуту".

I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."

I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."

I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."

languages.text: “很抱歉，舰长大人，但伊迪拉坚持要见您一面。她看起来很焦虑，直接朝您的房间过去了。她当时好像在嘀咕些什么‘彻底解决她所有的问题’。我没能说服她下次再来，所以我在想，她可能随时都会到达您的房间。”
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but Idira insists on being granted an audience. She seemed quite anxious and headed straight to your chambers. I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉，舰长大人，但伊迪拉坚持要见您一面。她看起来很焦虑，直接朝您的房间过去了。她当时好像在嘀咕些什么‘彻底解决她所有的问题’。我没能说服她下次再来，所以我在想，她可能随时都会到达您的房间。”

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, doch Idira besteht darauf, eine Audienz gewährt zu bekommen. Sie schien recht aufgeregt und ist geradewegs in Eure Gemächer gegangen. Sie hat etwas von einer 'Lösung für all ihre Probleme' gemurmelt. Ich konnte sie nicht überzeugen, auf einen besseren Augenblick zu warten, sie wird also wohl jeden Augenblick dort sein."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but Idira insists on being granted an audience. She seemed quite anxious and headed straight to your chambers. I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain, doch Idira besteht darauf, eine Audienz gewährt zu bekommen. Sie schien recht aufgeregt und ist geradewegs in Eure Gemächer gegangen. Sie hat etwas von einer 'Lösung für all ihre Probleme' gemurmelt. Ich konnte sie nicht überzeugen, auf einen besseren Augenblick zu warten, sie wird also wohl jeden Augenblick dort sein."

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais Idira insiste pour que vous lui accordiez une audience. Elle semble agitée et est déjà en chemin vers vos quartiers. Il me semble l'avoir entendue marmonner quelque chose à propos d'une solution à tous ses problèmes. Malheureusement, je n'ai pas pu la convaincre d'attendre un moment plus propice pour vous en parler. Elle devrait arriver d'une minute à l'autre. »
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but Idira insists on being granted an audience. She seemed quite anxious and headed straight to your chambers. I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais Idira insiste pour que vous lui accordiez une audience. Elle semble agitée et est déjà en chemin vers vos quartiers. Il me semble l'avoir entendue marmonner quelque chose à propos d'une solution à tous ses problèmes. Malheureusement, je n'ai pas pu la convaincre d'attendre un moment plus propice pour vous en parler. Elle devrait arriver d'une minute à l'autre. »

languages.text: «Lo siento, Lord Capitán, pero Idira insiste en recibir una audiencia. Parecía ansiosa y ha acudido directamente a sus aposentos. Murmuraba algo sobre una "solución a todos sus problemas". No he podido convencerla para que espere el momento propicio, así que llegará en cualquier momento».
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but Idira insists on being granted an audience. She seemed quite anxious and headed straight to your chambers. I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, Lord Capitán, pero Idira insiste en recibir una audiencia. Parecía ansiosa y ha acudido directamente a sus aposentos. Murmuraba algo sobre una "solución a todos sus problemas". No he podido convencerla para que espere el momento propicio, así que llegará en cualquier momento».

languages.text: 「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。イディラがどうしても謁見したいと申しております。かなり不安そうな様子で、あなたの部屋に向かいました。『問題を全て解決する』とかなんとかつぶやいていたようです。タイミングを待つようにと伝えたのですが、聞き入れてもらえませんでした。すぐにでもそちらに到着されるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but Idira insists on being granted an audience. She seemed quite anxious and headed straight to your chambers. I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。イディラがどうしても謁見したいと申しております。かなり不安そうな様子で、あなたの部屋に向かいました。『問題を全て解決する』とかなんとかつぶやいていたようです。タイミングを待つようにと伝えたのですが、聞き入れてもらえませんでした。すぐにでもそちらに到着されるでしょう」

languages.text: "Bağışlayın Lord Kaptan ama İdira sizinle görüşebilmek için ısrar etti. Hayli endişeli görünüyordu, apar topar sizin odanıza gitti. 'Tüm dertlerine çare olacak bir şey' bulmuş, geveleyip duruyordu. Daha uygun bir zamanı beklemesi için ikna etmeye çalıştım ama beceremedim. Varmak üzeredir, tekrar affınızı diliyorum."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Lord Captain, but Idira insists on being granted an audience. She seemed quite anxious and headed straight to your chambers. I believe she was muttering something about 'a solution to all her problems.' I could not convince her to wait for a better time, so I am afraid she will be there any minute now."
